xsl:element.name: CustomSQL
xsl:element.xsl:attribute: SELECT ORS.ORDER_LINE_KEY,ORS.STATUS,STATUS_DATE,ORS.STATUS_QUANTITY,ORS.TOTAL_QUANTITY,OS.DESCRIPTION FROM AWS_STER_SCH.YFS_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS ORS,AWS_STER_SCH.YFS_STATUS OS WHERE ORS.ORDER_LINE_KEY='' AND ORS.STATUS=OS.STATUS AND OS.PROCESS_TYPE_KEY='ORDER_FULFILLMENT' ORDER BY ORS.STATUS_DATE ASC with ur

xsl:element.name: CustomSQL
xsl:element.xsl:attribute: SELECT ORS.ORDER_LINE_KEY,ORS.STATUS,STATUS_DATE,ORS.STATUS_QUANTITY,ORS.TOTAL_QUANTITY,OS.DESCRIPTION FROM AWS_STER_SCH.YFS_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS ORS,AWS_STER_SCH.YFS_STATUS OS WHERE ORS.ORDER_LINE_KEY='' AND ORS.STATUS=OS.STATUS AND OS.PROCESS_TYPE_KEY='ORDER_FULFILLMENT' ORDER BY ORS.STATUS_DATE,ORS.STATUS ASC with ur
